explains: vt. 使变丑；损毁……的外形；使大为减色

sentences.en: To disfigure the mouth—this is how I would interpret it—to disfigure the mouth has a primary effect in rendering one at least temporarily speechless.
sentences.cn: 把嘴巴丑化——这就是我所理解的——丑化自己的嘴巴使自己暂时不能说话，它是有十分重要影响的。

sentences.en: They use an axe and disfigure the rhino's face.
sentences.cn: 他们用斧头砍，把犀牛的脸都砍坏了。

sentences.en: These diseases blind, maim, disfigure, debilitate, and disable.
sentences.cn: 这些疾病会使人失明、残疾、毁容、虚弱和丧失能力。
